Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A simple prayer to the Virgin Mary — one quatrain

ShrewsRO3232.Transcription:
Merci Marie maydene cleneþu let me neuer on sunne duelepray
                    for me þat it be sene& get me fro þe pine of ele
ShrewsRO3232.Editions:
Brett,  Cyril. 
             “Two Newly Found Middle English Texts.” 
             Modern Language Review
         22 (1927): 73-5: 74.
Wells,  John Edwin. 
             Manual of the Writings in Middle English, 1050-1400.
         New Haven, CT: Connecticut Academy of Arts and Sciences, 1916: Fourth Suppl., 1281.
